Indianapolis Colts | Software Developer | Indianapolis, IN | Onsite

The Software Developer works directly with members of Football Operations to support and develop rich, interactive applications. The position is responsible for estimating, coding, testing, developing and maintaining a centralized player evaluation/football management system. The Software Developer helps implement and oversee agile project management efforts as well as all source control and build requirements.

For more & to apply https://goo.gl/xz9vZT
